data.name: Automation_OperationCannotBePerformed
data.value: Cannot perform operation.
data.comment: Exception thrown by automation peers.

data.name: DomainUpDown_CurrentIndex_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid index value '{0}'
data.comment: Exception thrown when the index is not within the collection.

data.name: DomainUpDown_InvalidInputAction_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid InvalidInputAction value '{0}'
data.comment: Exception thrown when the InvalidInputAction property is provided an invalid value.

data.name: Expander_OnExpandDirectionPropertyChanged_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid ExpandDirection value '{0}'.
data.comment: Exception thrown when the ExpandDirection property is provided an invalid value.

data.name: ListTimePickerPopup_TimeItemsSelection_ReadOnly
data.value: Cannot set read-only property TimeItemsSelection.
data.comment: Exception thrown when a TimeItemsSelection is being set.

data.name: InvalidAttemptToChangeReadOnlyProperty
data.value: Invalid attempt to change read-only property "{0}."
data.comment: Exception thrown when a read-only property is changed.

data.name: NumericUpDown_EnsureValidDoubleValue_InvalidDoubleValue
data.value: Invalid double value '{0}': valid value is of double type and within decimal range.
data.comment: Exception thrown when dependency properties are provided an value that's not a valid double value or not in the decimal range.

data.name: NumericUpDown_EnsureValidIncrementValue_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid Increment value '{0}': valid value is of double type, within decimal range, and positive
data.comment: Exception thrown when the Increment property is provided an value that's not a double value, or not in decimal range, or is negative or zero.

data.name: NumericUpDown_OnDecimalPlacesPropertyChanged_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid DecimalPlaces value '{0}': valid value is of int type and within 0 and 15 inclusive.
data.comment: Exception thrown when the DecimalPlaces property is provided an value not in the range of 0 and 15 inclusive.

data.name: ObservableObjectCollection_ReadOnly
data.value: The collection is currently ReadOnly and should not be modified.
data.comment: Exception thrown when the collection is readonly and was modified.

data.name: Picker_OnMaxDropDownHeightPropertyChanged_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid maximum drop down height value '{0}'. The value must be greater than or equal to zero.
data.comment: Exception thrown when the MaxDropDownHeight dependency property is seto to a value that is negative.

data.name: Picker_PopupButtonModeNotValid
data.value: Invalid PopupButtonMode value '{0}'.
data.comment: Exception thrown when the PopupButtonMode is improperly set.

data.name: Spinner_SpinNotValid
data.value: Spin action is not valid at this moment.
data.comment: Exception thrown when spinning in a direction that is not currently valid.

data.name: TimeInput_PopupMinutesInterval_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid PopupMinutesInterval '{0}'. The interval can be set to 0 (no interval) to and including 59.
data.comment: Exception thrown when an invalid interval is set.

data.name: TimeInput_PopupSecondsInterval_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid PopupSecondsInterval '{0}'.The interval can be set to 0 (no interval) to and including 59.
data.comment: Exception thrown when an invalid interval is set.

data.name: TimePicker_PopupSetInStyle
data.value: Cannot set the PopupProperty in a style. Please use PopupTemplate.
data.comment: Exception thrown when the PopupProperty is set in a style.

data.name: TimePicker_PopupTimeSelectionModeNotValid
data.value: Invalid PopupTimeSelectionMode for this popup, value '{0}'.
data.comment: Exception thrown by a TimePickerPopup if it does not support the selected PopupTimeSelectionMode.

data.name: TimeUpDown_OnTimeHintContentChanged
data.value: Cannot set read-only property TimeHintContent.
data.comment: Exception thrown when the TimeHintContent property is improperly set.

data.name: TypeConverters_ConvertFrom_CannotConvertFromType
data.value: '{0}' cannot convert from '{1}'.
data.comment: Exception thrown when a type converter is asked to convert something it cannot.

data.name: TypeConverters_Convert_CannotConvert
data.value: '{0}' is unable to convert '{1}' to '{2}'.
data.comment: Exception thrown when a type converter fails to convert a value to another type.

data.name: UpDown_ParseException
data.value: Cannot parse text '{0}'
data.comment: Exception thrown when the text supplied cannot be parsed.

data.name: RatingAutomationPeer_SetValue
data.value: Value must be null or a number between 0 and 1.
data.comment: Exception thrown when a change is made to an automation peer.

data.name: RatingAutomationPeer_GetLocalizedControlTypeCore
data.value: Rating
data.comment: The localized control type used by the RatingAutomationPeer.

data.name: RatingItemAutomationPeer_GetLocalizedControlTypeCore
data.value: Star
data.comment: The localized control type name used by the RatingItemAutomationPeer.

data.name: Rating_SetItemCount_ItemCountMustBeLargerThanOrEqualToZero
data.value: Value must be larger than or equal to 0.
data.comment: Exception thrown when the ItemCount is set to a value smaller than 0.

data.name: AutoComplete_OnFilterModePropertyChanged_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid FilterMode enumeration value. The value must be one of the defined AutoCompleteFilterMode values to be accepted.
data.comment: Exception thrown when the FilterMode dependency property is set to a value that does not pass the enum validation step in the property changed handler.

data.name: AutoComplete_OnMaxDropDownHeightPropertyChanged_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid maximum drop down height value '{0}'. The value must be greater than or equal to zero.
data.comment: Exception thrown when the MaxDropDownHeight dependency property is seto to a value that is negative.

data.name: AutoComplete_OnMinimumPopulateDelayPropertyChanged_InvalidValue
data.value: Invalid MinimumPopulateDelay value '{0}'. The value must be greater than or equal to zero.
data.comment: Exception thrown when the MinimumPopulateDelay dependency property is changed to a negative value.

data.name: AutoComplete_OnSearchTextPropertyChanged_InvalidWrite
data.value: Cannot set read-only property SearchText.
data.comment: Exception thrown when the SearchText property is improperly set.

data.name: RoutedPropertyChangingEventArgs_CancelSet_InvalidOperation
data.value: The RoutedPropertyChangingEvent cannot be canceled.
data.comment: Exception thrown when setting Cancel property while IsCancelable is false.
